original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Zimri, and the conspiracy that he made, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
korean_text: 시므리의 남은 행위와 그가 반역한 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Zimri,
and the conspiracy that he made,
in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
